data.seo_description: All you need to talk about Station, the one app to rule them all

long.html: Help you perform your best work with the least distraction possible, every single day.

short.html: Station is a free desktop application that unifies all of your work tools in one place.

long.html: Station is the one app to rule them all: a platform that unifies all your web tools in a a neat & permanent interface, allowing you to be 10x more productive at work.

short.html: Browsers were never designed for work. People deserve a more productive way to access & use their web applications.

long.html:
Browsers have evolved to become the central way we do pretty much anything: shopping, scheduling, invoicing, monitoring, calling, texting, reading, watching, listening, writing, sharing: you name it. Along the way, as millions of humans were shifting to the browser as their main work tool, it started to show some weaknesses.


Today, we spend 90% of our working hours in web applications, but it's getting hard to stay focused: our natural impulse to open a new tab and get distracted needs to be tamed.

short.html: We've been featured by MacRumors, VentureBeat, TechCrunch, Engadget, Geekwire, CNET and many others.

long.html:
We've been featured by MacRumors, VentureBeat, TechCrunch, Engadget, Geekwire, CNET and many others.
We're proud winners of the Product of the Year 2017 award on Product Hunt.
We're backed by Accel Partners, YCombinator, Kima Ventures, Webb Investment Network & eFounders
